sections.purpose: To produce distilled water for microbiological media and reagent preparation.
sections.scope: Applicable to water purification activities in Microbiology.
procedure: Fill the boiler reservoir with potable or pre-filtered water.
Check all electrical and water connections.
Switch ON the unit and allow it to reach boiling.
Collect the distilled water in a clean, sterile container.
Monitor the flow rate and check for leaks in the tubing.
Turn OFF the unit when the required volume is collected or the reservoir is low.
Drain and clean the boiler periodically to remove scale.
Label the collected distilled water with date and source.
precautions: Do not operate the unit without sufficient water in the boiler.
Beware of hot surfaces and steam near the outlet.
Use heat-resistant gloves when performing maintenance.
Ensure proper earthing of the electrical system.
Descale the unit as per schedule to maintain efficiency.
